title: (45710) Madridejos - 69N Plaza Rústica-86
description: On the outskirts of this municipality there is a sports area and a bullring. There is a very large esplanade where we have spent the night.

title: (45710) Madridejos - Autovía del Sur
description: Repsol petrol station, direction Madrid-Seville. Very large parking for campers and caravans. There is, water hose, Wc drain and gray. At 50 meters from Santa Ana restaurant, good price and a cholesterol products store, beautiful.

title: (45700) Consuegra - 6 Avenida Castilla la Mancha
description: Parking in the center of town.

title: (45700) Consuegra - 35 Calle Azuqueca
description: Self-service laundry

name: Camper Parking Consuegra
title: (45700) Camper Parking Consuegra
description:
Gravel car park at the foot of the castle and the mills, with picnic tables, ideal for an overnight stay
Very quiet and superb view of the castle lit up at night.
The town itself is a 10 minute walk away.
The walk to the top is difficult and you should take your time.
The road that goes up to the mills / castles is prohibited for equipped vehicles!

title: (45700) Consuegra - 19 Calle Vertedera Alta
description: Sandy parking, near the center, ideal for visiting the city.

title: (45700) Consuegra - Nº 5 Calle Industrias
description: 24/24 service station: - toilet - water - car / truck wash - pneumatic pressure - vacuum cleaner Attention for vehicles over 6m long

title: (45700) Consuegra - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area under the pines and between the fields of olive trees. Absolutely not frequented because not indicated, we spent the night there. Only downside, the road although a hundred meters away, is busy. Perfect place surrounded by nature

title: (45720) Camuñas - 15 Calle las Viñas
description:
Área de fácil acceso, tranquila, ideal para descanso, vaciado de aguas sucias, llenado de aguas limpias. 
Cerca del pueblo, tiendas, bares y restaurantes.

title: (45700) Consuegra - 90 Calle Urda
description: Parking nearby the pool. In front of the mills and the castle. No problem for the night. Asphalted site with an unlimited and flat height.Next to the tennis and paddle tennis (paying and by reservation) and a free field with goal posts and basketball board. No service.

title: (45700) Consuegra - 29A Carretera Yébenes
description: Few parking spaces, but with plenty of shadows and a few tables. be careful to avoid the night because there is a great risk of rodents.

title: (45700) Consuegra - 7A Calle 1
description:
self-service laundry
Coffee
Meal

title: (45720) Autovía Madrid-Andalucia Km.132 -
description: Reception area for caravans and motorhomes with large space to spend the night in a short and long period of time. With running water supplies, discharges of gray and black water.

title: (45710) Madridejos - Unnamed Road
description: Wide esplanade many spaces between the pines to be in the shade. usual picnic area and camping allowed. There are several very good routes through the Valdehierro mountain range. Total silence during the night. There is a very interesting nature classroom. You arrive from the Madridejos, you have to pass the bridge over the highway and continue.

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 37 Calle Santa Cruz
title_short: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 37 Calle Santa Cruz
description: Public area for motorhome, quiet place, but it does not have water intake and the drainage tank of the chemical has a closed padlock, you can only empty the gray water.

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - Unnamed Road
description: Place near the mills of Puerto Lapice, about 300m approximately, the place is fairly well leveled, the views are magnificent, in the town there is a gas station and it is near, without limit of height and width by the access road to the place circulates agricultural machinery, a perfect place to stop in your travels

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 14 ኡርባኒሳሲኦን ላስ ላጉናስ
title_short: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 14 ኡርባኒሳሲኦን ላስ ላጉናስ
description: Perfect place next to the lagoons of Villafranca de los Caballeros. Flat ground floor. Beaches at 1min on the lake. Bar-Restaurant 2min walk. Peaceful place. Picnic tables and swings. I have spent the night very well.

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 40-42 Calle De Las Lagunas
title_short: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 40-42 Calle De Las Lagunas
description: Lagunas de Villafranca de los Caballeros, ideal for swimming and spending the day. Free parking and overnight accommodation. Large parking lot where an overnight stay was not a problem. Great for swimming June 2022. I recommend everyone to come to this region

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - 2 Calle Sierrecilla
description: Free service area. Caterer and shops 500 m away, in the center of the village. Easy access because well indicated by signs. View of the Mills. Be careful with clean water tap on the left when entering the area.

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - Unnamed Road
title_short: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - Unnamed Road
description: A lovely place away from everything. the truth still do not know if we can be or we are going to retire but it is worth visiting and see if you can stay overnight.

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros -
description: Great place to spend the day quietly or to sleep if you are not afraid, because you are lonely. You can do the bike route around the lagoons or walk to the small lagoon to see the migratory birds.

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - 58 Calle Calatrava
description: New municipal motorhome area of Puerto Lapice, next to the civil guard, with all services, within the town, 5 minutes walk from the square, views of the mills and the beginning of the route to visit the hermitage of San Isidro, several bike routes, and walking you can go up to the mills, from where you can see the entire region of la mancha.

title: (45480) Urda - 11 Calle Huerto del Abogado
description: Public parking with several places. On Fridays there is a market and it will not be possible. It is the fairground of the town.

title: (45480) Urda - 49 Calle Río Arriba
description: Drinking water

title: (45780) Tembleque - 100 Autovía del Sur
description: Service station with gas station, parking and fountain to recharge clean water

title: (13640) Herencia - 44 Avenida Alcázar
description: Beautiful view

title: (13640) Herencia - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in picnic area. Many tables. Plenty of parking space shaded by pine trees. We have spent the night very comfortable...

title: (13640) Herencia - Carretera Herencia
description: Platform to the mills

title: (45480) Urda -
description: Old picnic area with flat surfaces. Very quiet. Some trees provide shade. tables and benches.

title: (11408) Tembleque - 98 A-4
description: It's just a gross little respol rest stop but they have a water faucet to fill up from and parking. It's super trashy but eh. Free water and a bathroom.

title: (45789) Turleque - CM-4133
description: Roadside bar with space to stop and some shadows, little stop along the way

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - 140 A-4
description: Gas station and rest area La Pausa. Shower possible, usually for a small fee.

title: (13650) Puerto Lápice - Autovía del Sur
description: Next to a gas station, a little noisy by the passage of trucks but sure.

title: (45789) Caserío Venta Vieja -
description:
Not so difficult to access through sand roads. ok for bigger vans.

the spot is very calm, 100% nature. it's beautiful as well. But! 

it's a little dirty... we gathered 4 big trash bags in a 50m radius and were happy to clean the nature a little.

come with your kids and teach them to clean natural spots!

nasty bits appart, it's beautiful and calm and in the middle of nowhere, I'll come again to clean a different spot:)

title: (45789) Turleque -
description: Alone in the world by the lake, feet in the water. at the entrance of the lake a garbage can, remember to bring your waste there. very nice spot with duck and fish in the lake.

title: (13210) Villarta de San Juan - Autovía del Sur
title_short: (13210) Villarta de San Juan - Autovía del Sur
description: Motorway rest area, both directions. Close to the road, no barrier or vegetation between the picknicktables and the road. Decent view. No shade, no services (only bins).

title: (45789) Turleque -
description: Near the dam and its huge lake, several car parks used during the day by local fishermen. Breathtaking view.

title: (45780) Tembleque - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place where you can spend the night. It is an esplanade located at the entrance to the reservoir, so it is a good place for large vehicles. From 7 am and during the day you can hear cars coming into the swamp to fish or spend the day, but it's still very quiet. Less than 5 min walk towards the road there is a garbage can.

title: (45780) Tembleque - 61 Carretera Madrid
description: Municipal sports facilities parking, Avda. De Madrid. It would fit 10 ACs. Some flat and others with a slight incline. Shades and picnic area. Illuminated street and very close to the center. We stopped to eat, I don't know if it will be possible to spend the night. At noon very quiet

title: (45860) Villacañas - 78 Poligono 11
description: Leisure area with tables and benches (two of which are rented). Quiet (with a road nearby but very little traffic). No limited parking but with designated places.

title: (45780) Tembleque - 6 Calle las Cruces
description: Another alternative. Inside the town, next to the Plaza Mayor, direct access from the Córdoba highway

title: (45780) Tembleque - 3 Calle las Cruces
description: Beautiful land near the historic center.

title: (45780) Tembleque - 33 Calle Vega
description: Wide space, paved, 2 minutes walk from the Plaza Mayor. It is a street, without buildings, in the town. Much easier than the others.

title: (45790) Quero - Camino de Quero a la Villa de Don Fadrique
title_short: (45790) Quero - Camino de Quero a la Villa de Don Fadrique
description: Deserted roadside parking in the middle of a deserted area. this space was converted into a picnic and recreation area, it seems to have been abandoned since. flat and shaded ground, ideal for a break or a night.

address.street: Camino de Quero a la Villa de Don Fadrique

title: (45780) Tembleque - 6A Carretera Andalucía
description: Public parking of the Tembleque Sports Complex. A bit far from the center of town but a very quiet and safe place to spend the night. We came here because in the other place in the marked town they threw stones at the motorhome. I recommend this place to stay overnight.

title: (13210) Villarta de San Juan - 1B Calle Cervantes
title_short: (13210) Villarta de San Juan - 1B Calle Cervantes
description: Quiet area, at the entrance of the city and next to the football field, cafeteria and supermarket nearby

name: Área autocaravanas | Carrefour Alcázar de San Juan
title: (13600) Área autocaravanas | Carrefour Alcázar de San Juan
title_short: (13600) Área autocaravanas | Carrefour Alcázar de San Juan
description: Area with all services at the end of the Carrefour car park, all new and perfectly functional. Free, many thanks to the Carrefour store. There is a laundry room. Maximum stay 72 hours.

title: (45870) Lillo - Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas
title_short: (45870) Lillo - Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas
description: Large signposted parking esplanade, we sleep very quietly at night, there are more parking lots around the hermitage. Recreational area with picnic tables, a very beautiful hermitage, animals in captivity (raptors, ...) and archaeological remains of an old town. Very easy access by a dirt track, on the outskirts of town.

address.street: Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 262 Calle Pj Veguilla
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 262 Calle Pj Veguilla
description: Meadow of the Route of the Quijote, to the entrance of the Complex Lagoon of Alcázar de San Juan, ideal place for the observation aquatic birds, mainly flamingos. It has good access and has two picnic areas with shade. Only bad point that if it is very hot there is a bad smell because the purifier is next to it.

title: (13210) Villarta de San Juan - Autovía del Sur
title_short: (13210) Villarta de San Juan - Autovía del Sur
description: Impossible to sleep here because of the noise from the highway. however it is a wonderful shady spot and the pool in summer is glorious.

title: (13679) Arenas de San Juan - 2T Calle Cervantes
title_short: (13679) Arenas de San Juan - 2T Calle Cervantes
description: Nice location for several motorhomes. Flat ground shaded or in the sun if desired. Very calm.

title: (45770) El Romeral - 28 Camino Presado
description: Place in the countryside next to mills nice no cons indication no shade trash on the site

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 1D Calle Tomelloso
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 1D Calle Tomelloso
description: Area managed by the city council, it is located in a central area.

title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 22 Calle Rondilla Cruz Verde
description: Good utility room for washing clothes and close to town centre.

title: (45860) Villacañas - Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas
title_short: (45860) Villacañas - Camino del Romeral a las Pueblas
description: Perfect for resting and strolling along the river off the road 1 km

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 5 Carretera San Isidro
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - 5 Carretera San Isidro
description: Cerro and Ermita de San Isidro Easy access by track, plots of land, quite shade, there are bathrooms but are usually closed. Close to all the services of the town. Nice views of Campo de Criptana and the beautiful Manchego sunset. You can walk up to the top of the hill.

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - Unnamed Road
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - Unnamed Road
description: Next to the antenna, going up through the cemetery and water tank. Large space with pine trees and excellent views of the hill of the mills and the town of Alcázar de San Juan.

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - Unnamed Road
title_short: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to the windmills. Picnic area next, with benches and garbage cans. There is a fount. Quiet and secluded area with views of the city.

title: (45850) La Villa de Don Fadrique - 33A Calle Gibraltar
title_short: (45850) La Villa de Don Fadrique - 33A Calle Gibraltar
description: Free public parking. Quiet zone. Directly opposite there is a free emptying and filling service. Children's play area and very close to bakery and supermarket. On Mondays there is a market right next door and there is a municipal scale for each wallet.

title: (45400) -
description: Hermitage of the Virgen de la Antigua. Parking to enjoy magnificent views of the town, mountains of Toledo and several castles. Overnight is not recommended, as it is uneven. Start of mountain biking and hiking routes along a path that surrounds the mountain range in front. On the way there is a house with a well, from which clean water can be recharged.

title: (45400) Mora - 37 Calle Manzaneque
description: Laundry. Hours from 8 a.m. to 11 p.m.

title: (45470) Los Yébenes - 297 Plaza Rústica-4
description: Los Yebenes Municipal Park. The area is newly created, very clean. It has panoramic views of the town and the area is very quiet. Good shade.

title: (45400) Mora - 24 Camino Santa Lucía
description: Parking of the municipal soccer field. No services. During the day somewhat crowded, but at night it is quiet to sleep. Next to the swimming pool and municipal park.

title: (45400) Mora - 2 Carretera Cementerio
description: Mini 3-seater ac area with gray discharge grid in each square. To the left there is a sewage box (marked WC) and behind it in wall cupboard is the fresh water. Its a bit difficult to locate everything but it works for servicing, if you don't need electricity, it does its job.

title: (45400) Mora - 0 Carretera Orgaz-Manzaneque
description: Parking area without services and with some shade. Very close to sports areas, municipal swimming pool, civil guard and a park with grass and shade.

title: (45760) La Guardia - Carretera de Andalucía
description: Large classic service station parking for trucks possibility of getting to the very bottom to avoid noise only drawback ... no shade but it can help

title: (13680) Fuente el Fresno - Unnamed Road
description: Cemetery parking next to a hill with a white windmill, incredible views. the parking is not very level but some decent spots are around.

title: (13610) Campo de Criptana - 22 Calle Sol
description: Great place to rest in peace, there are picnic areas and a beautiful hermitage with a shop to buy drinks, souvenirs, etc...

name: Area Autocaravanas De Campo De Criptana
title: (13610) Area Autocaravanas De Campo De Criptana
title_short: (13610) Area Autocaravanas De Campo De Criptana
description: From Alcazar de San Juan and Mota del Cuervo it is reached by the N-420. Once in the town center, follow the signs for the sports area. The area is located near an industrial park and the sports center. Authorized stay, 48 hours. Nearby there is a park, a restaurant, shops, gas station and public swimming pools (in season).

title: (45450) Orgaz - 2 Camino los Yébenes
description: Large flat parking, no services

title: (13610) Campo de Criptana - 9 Calle Barbero
description: Parking near the windmills that you can visit inside for a small fee. You will be explained how it works. Beautiful view of the village.

title: () La Guardia - 1A Calle Cercas del Cura
title_short: () La Guardia - 1A Calle Cercas del Cura
description: Quiet place to get to know the town, near the square and get to know the town. Not recommended for large motorhomes. Shared with cars. Spectacular sunsets from the North Pass.

title: (45430) Mascaraque - CM42
description: Service station with free drinking water.

title: (13600) Alcázar de San Juan -
description: Pine forest near Campo de Criptana. No services. Good access from the highway. There is garbage in some area but other areas are clean and nice.

title: () La Guardia - 117 Urbanización Santo Niño
description: Large, flat earthen car park a stone's throw from the Hermitage of Santo Niño completely free access but no shade but tranquility guaranteed you are far from any service but it is not very far from the highway

title: () Toledo - Unnamed Road
description: Rest area La Guardia. With enough trees and picnic tables. Ideal to rest on the way to the south and especially at noon. Source with non-potable water.

title: () La Guardia - Unnamed Road
description: A couple of picnic tables and several benches in an unpopulated area but very close to the highway, making it a good place to stop for lunch or rest.

title: () La Guardia - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place by the highway in the fields. Ideal for one night

title: (45760) La Guardia - 79 Autovía del Sur
description: Large parking at the edge of the highway behind a hotel restaurant. Plenty of room to put in the background to avoid noise

title: (13250) Daimiel - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area in the natural park of Daimiel. Green Zone. Possibility of walks and bike. Ask permission to park information or the guardian. Free. No service available. Toilets in the House of the Park during opening hours.

title: (13250) Daimiel - Carr a las Tablas de Daimiel
title_short: (13250) Daimiel - Carr a las Tablas de Daimiel
description: Places to spend the night near the Tablas de Daimiel

address.street: Carr a las Tablas de Daimiel

title: (45760) La Guardia -
description: Nice spot to spend the night next to a ruined building. Quite large with very clear view and beautiful sunset Slightly uneven track but doable in Van. Pay attention to the route proposed by the gps. To get there, go through the Camino de la Laguna at La Guardia then continue straight ahead #BOF

title: (13690) Alameda de Cervera - 5D Calle San Lorenzo
title_short: (13690) Alameda de Cervera - 5D Calle San Lorenzo
description: Rest area. Quiet park. Playground too. Picnic area. No water, no electricity, no other services. Very clean. Ideal to spend the night near the highway CM-42 Autovía de los Viñedos. You can hardly hear the traffic.

title: (45420) Almonacid de Toledo - 1 Calle Santa Bárbara
title_short: (45420) Almonacid de Toledo - 1 Calle Santa Bárbara
description: Fantastic place at the castle ruins "Castillo Almonacid de Toledo" with a magnificent all-round view and a fantastic sunset. Space for two or three vehicles. Unsuitable for larger vehicles, as the drive in the village leads through very narrow streets.

title: (45880) Corral de Almaguer - Sendero virgen de la Muela, 29
title_short: (45880) Corral de Almaguer - Sendero virgen de la Muela, 29
description: Address: Nuestra Señora de la Muela Coronada Sanctuary, C / La Virgen (address C / El Prado is wrong) Quiet place to eat, it has barbecues, benches, lots of shade and you can visit the hermitage in which there are bathrooms. We can also find containers and a water source. You cannot spend the night since the hermitage closes around 6-7 in the afternoon

title: (45830) Miguel Esteban - Camino de Quero al Toboso
title_short: (45830) Miguel Esteban - Camino de Quero al Toboso
description: Parking day and night, near a lagoon with lots of wildlife and Manchego mills, very quiet place and easy access

title: (45830) Miguel Esteban - 2 CM-3162
description: Large car park of the hermitage of San Isidro with its church and its mills. Ideal place for wildlife lovers, on the other side of the road there is a lagoon with a great diversity of birds, very close to El Toboso de Dulcinea land, a nearby villa provides free water

title: (13220) Llanos del Caudillo - 14 Poblado Llanos Caudillo
title_short: (13220) Llanos del Caudillo - 14 Poblado Llanos Caudillo
description: Well leveled paved streets in an area without buildings, calm and quiet to rest or spend the night.

title: (13250) Daimiel - Unnamed Road
description: Parking on the edge of the Navaseca lagoon, without service. There is no prohibition sign. Tour to the lagoon of 3 km on foot, with observatories and many birds to see. Quiet and friendly.

title: (45750) Huerta de Valdecarábanos - 139 Extrarradio
description: Free municipal parking. Located in a very quiet area, next to a beautiful hermitage and playground.

title: (13250) Daimiel - 30 Paseo Carmen
description: Station service in Daimiel signposted by Cepsa where motorhomes are welcome. It has a car park, black and gray water drainage areas, and drinking water filling. Sale of butane and propane, firewood and biomass. It has a free shower for guests and a cafeteria. Very clean bathrooms with breastfeeding area. Shop with local products. The owner has another low cost gas station next to this one with great fuel discounts and a wash area. You can park and sleep without problem in one of its esplanades.

title: (45750) Huerta de Valdecarábanos - 8 Plaza Mazón
description: Small free parking. Peaceful place.

title: (45880) Corral de Almaguer - 59 Diseminado C/s
description: It is a restaurant to eat very well and cheap, perfect parking.

title: (13250) Daimiel - 13 Calle Pontevedra
description: Daimiel. near the center, a few km. natural park of Las Tablas de Daimiel and Motilla de Azuer. Quiet. close gas station, restaurant, workshop, supermarkets

title: (45311) Dosbarrios - 3 Camino Barranco
description: Flat and quiet. Very close to a bar/restaurant.

title: (45312) Cabañas de Yepes - 2-3 Plaza del Calvario
title_short: (45312) Cabañas de Yepes - 2-3 Plaza del Calvario
description: Site for two caravans, very calm and empty of water. There is neither light nor bathroom, maximum 72 hours of parking authorized by the city council. They do not allow deployment.

title: (45311) Dosbarrios -
description: Highway service area. There is a Hotel/ Restaurant/ Cafeteria. Discreet and quiet parking with some noise from the motorway. Ideal to spend a night on the road.

title: (13150) Carrión de Calatrava - Carretera de la Virgen
title_short: (13150) Carrión de Calatrava - Carretera de la Virgen
description: Virgin of the Incarnation Huge picnic area with toilets and water (not drinkable?)

title: (45300) Ocaña - N-4 Camino de San Gregorio
title_short: (45300) Ocaña - N-4 Camino de San Gregorio
description: A gas station with a shower. hot water and good treatment

title: (13200) Manzanares - 29 Carretera N-iv K-173,100
description: Parking lot close to a hotel/cafeteria, next to burger king and a gas station. Bit noisy in the morning because of the highway nearby, but we found it very fine. Possibility of loading water at the gas station. Fast electric car recharge if you’r traveling with an electric van.

title: (13200) Manzanares - 21 Calle Olimpia
description: Large parking lot where we spent a very quiet night without disturbing anyone and without being disturbed. It is next to a small police station, I understand that a little more noise was heard during the week. Local Police very close and the town. The place doesn't have any charm, but it's fine to sleep when you're passing through. no services

title: (13200) Manzanares - 38 Carretera de Madrid
description: We stayed one night. Public swimming pool right next to the place where we enjoyed a swim and a nice shower.

title: (13200) Manzanares - 12 Carretera de la Solana
description:
Laundry in the center of town, with a van it is easy to park on the same street, with AC perhaps more complicated, but surely there is somewhere nearby.
Open 365 days from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m.

title: (13200) Manzanares - 15 Avenida Don Emiliano García Roldán
title_short: (13200) Manzanares - 15 Avenida Don Emiliano García Roldán
description: Parking at the park.

title: (45300) Ocaña - 6 Calle Julian Sanchez Prieto
description: Asphalt parking without services. We have asked at the Tourist Office and they have told us that it is enabled for motorhomes. In our opinion a little lonely

title: (45300) Ocaña - Cam. Sitio O de Ontigola
title_short: (45300) Ocaña - Cam. Sitio O de Ontigola
description: Good for a break
